title: TCL C715 Series 126 cm (50 inch) QLED Ultra HD (4K) Smart Android TV with Handsfree Voice Control & Dolby Vision & Atmos  (50C715)

product_specification.In The Box: 1N LED TV, 1N Stand, 1N Audio Cable, 1N User Manual, 1N Warranty Card, 1N Remote, 2N Batteries, 1N Wall Mount
product_specification.Other Video Features: Color Gamut: 93% DCI-P3 Coverage, Backlight Adjustable, Color Temperature, Picture Mode: Standard/Smart HDR/Sport/Movie/Dynamic, Multimedia Video/Audio Decoder: H.265/H.264,MPEG1/2/4,VP8,VP9, Video Format Up to: 4K at 60 Hz-12 bit 4:2:2, 4K at 60 Hz-8 bit 4:4:4
product_specification.Sound Mode: Dynamic, Standard, Movie, Music, Voice, Game, Stadium
product_specification.Other Internet Features: Google Play Store, TV+ App Store, T-CAST, YUPPTV, T-Browser, Media Center, E-Sticker, Dailymotion, Prime Videos
product_specification.Stand Features: VESA Mounting: WMB234, VESA Hole Pattern: 200 x 200, Screw Size: M6 x 15, Screw Length: 15 mm, Screw Quantity: 4
product_specification.Other Dimensions: Gross Weight With Packaging: 15.6 kg, Screw Size: M5 x 25, Screw Length: 25 mm, Screw Pitch: 0.7 mm, Screw Quantity: 4
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product + 1 Year Additional on Panel
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV.The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost.The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features.The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested.Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settingsQuick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Stunning Visuals: This TCL TV features the Quantum Dot Technology to produce bright images in a rich colour palette.
product_description.Voice Recognition: This Smart TV comes inbuilt with Google Assistant that allows you to replace the remote with your voice. Just say “Ok Google” or “Hey Google” to control the TV, change channels, set reminders for programs, etc.

review: Picture quality is average, at every angle not like a qled tv. I think its panel is B grade. Picture settings needs very fine adjustment. Sound is average. HDMI arc port is not properly matching with sony home theater. Picture upscaling is also poor. So don't waste your hard earned money for such scrap tv. So don't buy TCL qled TV, rather go for 4K tv only if you want to purchase in this brand. However after installation I got two updates. Picture settings can be improved by software updates, hopes TCL fix this in future updates. If flipkart replace this tv with other brand without any money deduction then I will definitely prefer other brands. If I compare it with my earlier Vu premium Tv 50inch then in every angle Vu Tv is best.

Hello all this is a really good TV
1.Picture quality watching 4K on this tv is wow .. colors are wonderful blacks are deep, I watched Grand tour season 2, 1st episode in that they show super cars in Switzerland.. too good.
2.sound I will not say it’s the best but enough
3.android on the tv is good response is nice .. not the fastest but good enough I would say...
4.only negative point is that the panel is bit reflective and brightness is 330nits so if you are watching a very dark movie which has lots of blacks then you have make sure the room is dark to enjoy the movie to the fullest ( dark curtains should do the job)
Overall I think it’s value for money 👍👍

So nice Dolby vision and Dolby Atmos I loved my tv it was fabulous and it has HDR 10+ and TCL TVs are better than Mi TVs
The sound can hear at my apartment basement it was litterally amazing thank you flipkart

Super excellent nd marvelous TV. Connectivity of Wifi nd screen mirroring r so fast. Clarity is very very good. Delivery & Installation had no problem for me. Thank U for flipkart nd TCL for their services.
Good

Budget qled TV with lots of features.

Picture quality is good. Supports Hdr and 4k videos. Tv has decent looks. Sound quality is OK. 3 years warranty is another attractive feature. Tv is fully android. Good
Value for money. Happy with the product.
Absolutely Stunning 😍 My Q led Quantum Dot Fantastic picture Quality LG Samsung won't come near to TCL thank you Flipkart Big Billion Stunning Deal Breaker 2021

Writing this review after 5 months of usage.

1.) 4K/UHD: well it really make a difference. Currently there is enough streeming content available by Netflix and Prime and watching true 4K content really brings out the best viewer experience from this TV. Even watching regularly 1080p content also good but hey I brought this because its 4K and it's worth the extra money over the standard FHD LEDs.

2.) QLED vs OLED: Does this impact the contrast and colour depth? Yes and it does an amazing job. Compare this with any standard LED tv and you will feel the difference in the picture dept. A slight compromise if you compare the performance against a OLED but hey I have all my organs intact as I didn't have to sell any to bring home the QLED and I have no regrets.

3.) The built in audio does a decent job. Plays most of the frequencies. But if you want a theatre like effect have a decent sound bar connected via ARC it's worth the investment.
Excellent tv 3 yr warranty great sound SD channel upscale is average HD channel great

I am writing this review after 2 weeks of usage. Clarity and sound is awesome. Unexpected. I would recommend this tv. Initially I faced a connectivity issue with inbuilt chromecast. But it works when I tried again. Didn’t see any negative. Also works well with x-box one.

Picture quality is average, at every angle not like a qled tv. I think its panel is B grade. Picture settings needs very fine adjustment. Sound is average. HDMI arc port is not properly matching with sony home theater. Picture upscaling is also poor. So don't waste your hard earned money for such scrap tv. So don't buy TCL qled TV, rather go for 4K tv only if you want to purchase in this brand. However after installation I got two updates. Picture settings can be improved by software updates, hopes TCL fix this in future updates. If flipkart replace this tv with other brand without any money deduction then I will definitely prefer other brands. If I compare it with my earlier Vu premium Tv 50inch then in every angle Vu Tv is best.

I am writing this review after 2 weeks of usage. Clarity and sound is awesome. Unexpected. I would recommend this tv. Initially I faced a connectivity issue with inbuilt chromecast. But it works when I tried again. Didn’t see any negative. Also works well with x-box one.

Picture quality is excellent, HDR10 + , Dolby vison is pleasant to watch. Dolby Atmos Sound quality is good. Don't expect Atmos 7.1.2 effect from this 30W speakers. DTS Tru surround supported is just average,
Tv remote with a dedicated Netflix only button. Far field voice assistant is a plus.

I am very much Impressed with picture quality offered by TCL QLED ! Sound quality is decent too ... Fully featured remote would have made a lot of difference. However, overall happy with the purchase this technological advanced TV with voice command feature at such a low price as compere with other brands............😊
Wonderful tv using it since 1 month every feature working Nice and perfect as shown in specs great Qled tv at low price..... Just Awesome Product....👌👌👌

Very good product good picture quality , good sound, value for money



But side viewing angle just disappointed
Other wise good

The sound starts to distort at more than 25% volume. (Which can be managed by external speakers, cause it supports Dolby Atmos)
But the rest of the tv is awesome, the the picture quality is great, and movie watching experience is like theatre. And of these in a affordable price.

Today first day awesome picture quality and sounds, worth of money, one doubt 3 yrs warranty, demo person said maximum 1 year online purchase, please clarification warranty. And how to extension warranty.
Tv looks good and the performance also good. But the installation was unsatisfactory.

The TV is fine. Even though it is a QLED we don't feel the picture quality is good especially when you are viewing regular 1080 HD content. We watched Australian Open tennis and there is some lag in movement. For regular movies it's fine.

My reason for 1 star is because of installation. The person came and installed ok. Didn't know much about voice commands, etc. which is ok. The part that pissed me off is that he asked for Inr 250 for installation and argued that it is not free. I gave him the money and sent him off. The next day I got a call from TCL to check if I can put a review on Flipkart and the person was like it will only take 30 seconds and can you do it now. I informed him that the installation person took 250 for installation which should be free but then the rep was like it is not installation charges, it is for wall mount. The funny part is the wall mount is provided with the TV itself and we are not even using as we are using table top stand. Even after i told him this he kept going about the charge being for stand and covering up for the installation person taking money.

Initial impressions after two days usage :

This product is superb and fantastic. Very clear pic quality fast connection even on mobile Hotspot. Its runs smoothly not hanging after connecting Internet.
I like this QLED.

Impressed with picture quality offered by QLED ! Sound is decent too ... Fully featured remote would have made a lot of difference. However, overall happy with the purchase this techonolgical advanced machine at such a low price 😊
After using 2 days I can say that it's worth.. picture and sound quality awesome and even your cell phone u can connect internet and it's running quite smooth.

There is screen bleeding issue while booting up and in some apps. The picture quality is good, if you know how they adjust the setting. The sound is upto the mark. Happy with the picture quality now, but I am worried about the screen bleeding
I got this product in big billion days offer, good picture quality and options are lovely, especially Google voice assistant is excellent..
Although it's QLED but black levels are not up to the mark
Worst experience of my life. With flipkart and TCL
The picture quality is good. But the after sales support from tcl is pathetic. I have been waiting for service for last 6months.
